name: jaded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having interest or losing interest because you have experienced something too many times: Flying is exciting the first time you do it, but you soon become jaded. Perhaps some caviar can tempt your jaded palate.

your heart isn't in it idiom
See more results »
Add to word list
Add to word list
lacking interest or desire because of experiencing too much of something: Business travel is exciting at first, but you soon become jaded.
